info.title: Nextcloud
info.description: All supported Nextcloud APIs in one

order.description: Should always be an integer, but there is a bug. See https://github.com/nextcloud/server/issues/32828

feeds.description: This seems to be broken. In testing it is always empty

200.description: Navigation apps of the Nextcloud instance

parameters.name: sorter

parameters.name: proxyServer
parameters.description: This URL has to end with a / otherwise the device will not be able to register
